item.title: What is Tidy Text?
item.description: What Tidy Text Look Like? The specific structure of tidy text is: Each variable is a column Each observation is a row Each type of observational unit is a table Below is an example of a character vector: text <- c("Because I could not stop for Death -", "He kindly stopped for me -", "The Carriage held but just Ourselves -", "and Immortality") text ## [1] "Because I could not stop for Death -" ## [2] "He kindly stopped for me -" ## [3] "The Carriage held but just Ourselves -" ## [4] "and Immortality" We have taken four character strings; “Because I could not .
